Title: GeoTools has XML External Entity (XXE) Processing Vulnerability in XSD schema handling
Description: GeoTools Schema class use of Eclipse XSD library to represent schema data structure is vulnerable to XML External Entity (XXE) exploit.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 28.6.1, all versions starting from 29.0 before 31.7, all versions starting from 32.0 before 32.3, all versions starting from 33.0 before 33.1
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 28.6.1 before 29.0, all versions starting from 31.7 before 32.0, all versions starting from 32.3 before 33.0, all versions starting from 33.1
